basic.description: Students will arrange their reading in consultation with members of the Department. They will be expected to write reports on their readings and to discuss them throughout the term in seminars.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Directed Special Reading

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prereq: Level 4 & reg in SOCY MAJ or MED & (a min grade of C in SOCY210, SOCY211, SOCY226 & SOCY227) & (a min GPA of 2.60 in SOCY210, SOCY211, SOCY226, SOCY227 & (a min GPA of 2.60 in all units in SOCY).
